review:
Doctor is good and nice co-orporation 
1) Spending time with us and gathering our problems one by one 
2) Proper response 
3) There is no hesitation, if we are asking lot of questions
Doctor guidance is very good. Her explanation of the health issue is clear. Her treatment is satisfactory.

review: Very crowded and no transparency. Info is provided only at the neck of the moment and patients are left wit no option other than choosing the option provided by doc !

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

review: It was a good experience, the way of approach by the doctor explaining about the problem step by step.

She was very approachable. It was my first consultation with a gynecologist and I was very nervous and embarrassed about the way I was to face doctors questions. But after meeting her I felt ver ease and comfortable and happy. She made me feel easy to answer her questions and when I was out I felt very eager and looking forward to be a mother soon.
